Suddenly, she heard yelling.

"Ran-nee-chan, I'm home! When's dinner?" she heard Conan's high, soprano voice.

'As much as I want to, It wouldn't be right to Conan.' She thought, dishearteningly. She gave in almost immediately.

'Plus, if I can fatten up Conan, then I can certainly do the same for Shinchi! I mean those two are so alike, it's actually a little frightening... '

'So, it's decided then,' she thought as she started setting the table with food, 'I'll start fattening Conan first thing tomorrow. I can hardly wait!'

The next day, Ran found herself digging through the storage closet. She was knee-deep in boxes littered with junk and other worthless trash. Most of it were things that her mother had left behind when she had moved away. Ran couldn't help but feel a little sad at seeing the various mementos of when her parents were still living together.

"A-ha!" Ran thought to herself.

She had found the box she was looking for. It was a small container labeled "pregnancy holdovers". Naturally they weren't things her forty year old mother would really need to take. Ripping it open, Ran poked inside and quickly found her target. It was a small bottle of weight gain supplements. Apparently, during her pregnancy with Ran, Eri had trouble putting on the necessary birth-weight.
Two pills were all it took to remedy the situation.

With a wicked smile Ran left the closet and reentered the kitchen with pills in-hand. She dropped two of them into the meal that she left stewing on the stove. The little white capsules dissolved instantly, leaving behind only a cloud of mist. She leaned forward and breathed in the wonderful aroma as the door opened behind her.

"Ran-nee-chan, is dinner ready yet? I'm starving!" Conan whined.

"Geez, Conan," Ran said as she shoveled some of the slop into a bowl, "all you talk about is food these days. You're gonna be as big as Genta if you don't slow down."

Conan slapped her flat stomach playfully.

"Please, with all the soccer I play there's no way that'll happen," he replied as she passed him the bowl. He wasted no time in digging in. Ran took a seat beside him, watching him scarf it all down. Seeing him piggishly devour the fattening solution filled her with an odd pleasure.

"In that case, would you mind eating it all? Dad's going to play some Pachinko and I've already ate."

"Ehehehe," he laughed, "sure, I'll guess I can."

He tossed his emptied bowl. For the next half an hour the continued the process. Ran would fill his bowl and Conan would suck it down like a vacuum cleaner. The four gallon pot, nearly filled to the brim, had been emptied entirely. Somehow the ace detective had managed to stuff it all in his tiny stomach. He belly bulged outward like an over-stuffed balloon. Conan fell back into his chair, moaning.

"That's amazing Conan," Ran said, admiring his gut. She pressed a finger into it and found it to be as hard as a sheet of cement. The bespectacled youth didn't respond; he had passed out. Ran picked up his limp body and placed him in bed, clothes and all. She gently rubbed his stomach, enjoying every second of it.

"This may not be fat yet, but it will be" she thought, gleefully.

Ran herself then went to bed, dreaming dreams of an ever-fattening Shinichi. She didn't realize it at the time, but she had made a grievous error. Putting the pills in the piping hot stew had effectively vaporized them. While most of the solution went to its intended destination, Ran had inadvertently been exposed to the gaseous form.

Shortly before dinner was ready his father returned home with his brothers. Genta took this chance to switch his mc-device on before dinner, meaning it should be finished after eating. In the meantime his mother explained what Genta did to the others and they accepted it.
And so the world slowly forgot about the old identities from his new siblings, leaving only Conan existent. To others it seemed as Conan had been friends with the family and had adventures with them before finally deciding he would join the family. He had decided that for now that was okay, seeing as Genda was the only one of his new siblings that knew who he was before. Maybe he would change that, but only later.

After dinner Genta quickly checked his mc-device, seeing it had in fact finished the process successfully. He would have to ask someone outside the family about them for a last confirmation, but that could wait for the next day. So with everything as he wished it to be, Genta joined the others upstairs.

He had asked several classmates and teachers over the next few days, nobody remembered Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya, Ayumi Yoshida or Ai Haibara. Even the professor didn't know about having someone living with him. That meant now Genta had confirmed that his mc-device worked. All his new siblings were very close to each other and to the rest of the family and the others loved their new children / siblings without a second thought. They were all happy.
1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.title: Let the device work and seeing the results

1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.content:
Two weeks later Genta talked with Genda alone. He had the slight feeling that their was something that Genda was hiding from him about his past, so he decided to ask him.
“Genda, have you any secrets from your time before joining the family I should know about?” Thanks to his former adjustments to Conan's mind before and during his changes into Genda, he knows that Genda trusts him fully, meaning that if there is something to tell he would get an answer.
“There is really something that I have concealed from you all. I have been the high school detective Shinichi Kudo before I was poisoned. That poison should kill me, but it just shrunk me down into a small kid. I took cover as Conan Edogawa at first to find a solution for going back to being Shinichi, but now I want to stay who I am which is your brother Genta.”
Genta looked slightly surprised at that information. That would also explain why Conan had been so smart before. “But what about your old life then? And who knows about your true identity?”
“My old life wasn't anywhere near as good as it is now. My love to Ran changed to one of an older sibling over time and I don't want to go back and pretend I like her any other way. For who had known there isn't much. First is the professor, second are my real parents, third was Heiji Hattori and last was Ai, her being a member of the ones who poisoned me but quit later and took her own poison to kill herself, but instead she did shrink too. Others I wouldn't know about.”
That also explained Haibara's intelligence then. “And you haven't told us because you thought we could be in danger?”
“Yes. But with me and Ai no longer looking like kid versions of ourselves they will never find us.” Genda replied smiling.
1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.title: Talking with Genda about Conan's past

1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.content:
After some more talking Genda left to find the others while Genta sorted through what Genda had told him.
“That would mean if I wanted to let the world forget about Conan I should also alter the memories about Shinichi Kudo in that process. Or do so even if not. The others that know are no problem, they will forget the connections between Shinichi and Conan.”
With his mind set he walked into his basement to set up the mc-device for a new change. He typed in that Shinichi Kudo died that day and did the same for Shiho Miyano (as Genda had told him was Ai's original name). With nobody in the house for now, everyone, including Genda this time, would believe this. The only problem was what to do about Conans past. If Genda believed Shinichi was killed and he had no connection to him, what would be his memories for the time before he shrunk? Maybe Genta should change some memories of Genda first to be safe. But he would think about it for a couple of days, maybe Genda would profit from the memories later. So he switched the mc-device off again, but it saved the changes he wanted to make. He would not have to program them anew.
1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.title: Thinking about Conan's story

1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.content:
What Genta didn't calculated was that Heiji Hattori would stop by to look for Conan three days later. He had asked Ran about him only to hear that Conan had wanted to be part of the Kojima family, not that he understood why. So he came by only to run into Genda, who he mistook for Genta and asked him about Conan.
Genda had explained his old friend Heiji that he had been Conan after they had sat down in the living room where Genta found them. Heiji had laughed about that at first only to stop when seeing Genta looking a little mad at him. That was just like it had been with Haibara before.
“What should I do now? Changing something on Genda's memories while Heiji is here isn't good, and letting Heiji keep the knowledge isn't good either. But knocking out Heiji while Genda his here also won't work. Hmm...”
After standing there for a couple of minutes, Genta had decided what he wanted to do. “Genda, I need your help downstairs. Could you come with me?” “Of course, brother.”
With that Genda got up and went downstairs. Genta looked at Heiji. “What will you do now?”
Heiji looked nervous. When what the boy called Genda had said was true, then the boy in front of him, Genta, had somehow changed his best friend into a copy of himself and could be dangerous. Not answering for a some time, Genta took it into his own hands by taking out a stun watch similar to the one Conan had before and shoot Heiji with it. Heiji was to slow to escape the dart and quickly succumbed the effect.
“He should be stunned for half an hour, enough time to change Genda's memories.”
1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.title: A surprise visitor

And that he did. He went downstairs to Genda, seeing he was waiting to help him. “For what do you need my help, brother?”
Without giving an answer, Genta took aim and shoot his brother with a second dart of his watch. His own creation could keep five darts ready at all times. With Genda out like a light, Genta quickly put the helm on his head. He wouldn't need to change much for now. He would just suppress the memories of the time between Shinichi being Conan's age and him changing into Conan before adjusting some details, like wearing his old glasses as Shinichi, being called Conan instead of Shinichi and so on. 1212122111111112212111111111121221111111.title: Change Gendas memories

He would need to erase Heiji Hattori from the mind of others so nobody would look for him. After the process finished Genta waited two minutes before opening the machine. The boy inside was the next clone of himself, rapidly blinking to get used to the light after the time in darkness. Genta smiled that the remolding had been successful, but now he would have to move Heiji to get the helm on him. He was sure that Heiji wouldn't fight against him because he wouldn't have much strength left from the process. The only difference between the two , beside the missing clothes, was that Heiji was a bit darker skinned, not as much as before but still noticeable. “Just like Genma still has Mitsuhiko's freckles. Only Genda has no sign of his old body anymore.” Genta thought.
While Heiji was occupied with the mirror Genta got the helm and put it on Heiji's head, leaving the boy confused about what would happen now. But Genta was quick to start the process to suck out the intelligence and put it into a unit to keep it. He had thought about giving some intelligence back to his siblings later but wanted to keep the difference between them the same, so he had needed something as a kind of temporary storage.
Heiji started to panic because he could feel himself getting dumber and that wasn't pleasant because for one, the sucking wasn't painless to him and second nobody liked it when something you know just vanished. “Please stop” was a whimper from Heiji, still not having the energy to fight or do more then that. But it didn't stop until it was finished, leaving Heiji on the same level of intelligence as Genda and Genma were. If he wasn't bound to the chair and had the strength, Heiji would have massaged his temples to ease the pain.

“You will feel better when we are finished with the last part, so don't worry.” After that said, Genta put in the information his new brother would need, talking aloud in the process.
“Lets see. From now on you will be known as Genja Kojima, second youngest of the quad after Genma. You will be very loyal to the whole family, a little more so to your other quad brothers Genta, Genda and Genma as well as the twins Ginko and Gindo. Your dream is to become a sumo wrestler to show your fighting spirit. Finally you will remember being Heiji Hattori as a distant memory, but nothing concrete. Therefore you have memories of growing up alongside your new family." With that he started the helmet.
Heiji could do nothing as the helmet worked through his brain, changing his mind and memories just like Genta had said before, suppressing his old identity more the further the process progressed.
He could only ask weakly "But what will happen to the people who know me?"
"They have already forgotten about you. With another device I changed the memories of others so that to the world you died alongside Shinichi Kudo. Genda has no longer any recollection he had been born as him, but as Conan Edogawa."
After hearing that Heiji started to cry while the helmet worked. But the tears slowly decreased when Genja Kojima took place in his brain, who had no reason to cry.
Genta only found it slightly cruel of himself that Heiji had been awake through the whole process, but that was now the past. Genja wouldn't remember what happened after it finished and any ache would vanish over time. Heiji plead a last time, thinking about Kazuha, his last effort as Heiji Hattori before he vanished, imprisoned in the very back of the new mind of Genja, never to resurface again. With that only Genta had the knowledge who his new brother had been before. He cut the bindings, freeing Genja, only for him to fall unconscious the moment Heiji had finally vanished. “So now the body took his toll. But that is good for me, when you wake up again the pain should have vanished mostly, if not completely.” He put the clothes on Genja before he took him upstairs.

"...and there's uncle Genji, he's a great cook, I think we've been to his restaurant before. And there's his son Goro, he's trying to be a sumo wrestler! He's about the same age as Hiroshi and are good friends. I hate that they always pick on me and Souta at reunions. But with you there, I'm sure they're leave us alone! Right Conan!" said Genta as he was packing up his bag.

"You bet! I won't let you down!" responded Conan, who was done packing and was sitting on his futon.

'Although, since I'm a 4ft., 65 pound weakling right now, I doubt I'll be much help.' he thought inwardly.

While that was certainly true, Conan was however a bit wrong when stating his body's weight.

In the week that Conan was at Genta's place, he had gained about 15 pounds, so he was really 80 pounds. Conan was still oblivious to his increasing weight, as he had not stood in a mirror for more than a few minutes in the morning, and had casually batted away any thoughts that may have concerned his expanding girth when he had gotten clothes 2 sizes bigger than what he usually wore, stating that it was logical that he'd gain a little weight with having to spend that summer at Genta's place and he could just melt of the 5 or at most 8 pounds he'd gain with a bit of soccer and criminal chasing.

Right now, he was dressed in a way that resembled Genta's own clothing style, with a green shirt and blue shorts, which were smaller than Genta's, since they were his when he was five. Although, wearing a five-year old Genta's clothing on a seven-year old Conan would have him look like a clown, had he not had the extra weight. In fact, it fitted him pretty well, it even was starting to feel a bit snug.

"Oi, Genta, Mom and Dad said for you and Conan to hurry up! It's a long drive to uncle Daiki's house in Osaka!" yelled Hiroshi.

"Coming! Come on Conan, let's go." said Genta as he and Conan ran down the stairs.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Genta's uncle Daiki owned a huge estate and a large staff of butlers and maids with his wife and two kids on the outskirts of Osaka. Being a CEO of a large software company, he made enough to invite and house his entire family for one week, which included his parents, his Genta's family and his brother's Genji's family, his parents' siblings and their family, their parents' siblings' families and some of the closer but still a bit distant relatives.

As they reached the estate and parked into the driveway, they were greeted by Daiki, who had come out to greet his first visitors and to catch up on old times with his younger brother.

"Ah, Jiro! Come in, come in! How are you and Fujimi doing?" said Daiki, as he led his them to the living room.

"We're doing great, and the store's fine as well. Although, I've noticed I've gotten a bit more pudge around the middle as of late."

"Ahahaha, the woes of aging! Those pounds just seem to pile on once you've had children! Which reminds me, unless you've managed to pull a prank on me for the last seven years, I'm pretty sure that you had only three children."

"Oh, Conan! He's Genta's friend. His guardians couldn't take him with them this summer and asked us to take care of him. Great kid, although I'm afraid our eating habits have rubbed off on him. Seems I'm not the only with more pudge around the middle lately. Makes me feel a bit guilty since Fujimi's cooking is what probably caused most of his weight gain. And with every other Kojima woman coming, I'm sure we'll all need a bigger set of clothes after this week."

"Speak for yourself, I've already bought my clothes. So, how much has young Conan gained?"

"Look for yourself. Here's a picture I was given by his Nee-chan, Ran, in case something happened and the police needed to identify him. Look at that for a moment and compare it to Conan. Let me just call him over. Conan-kun, would you please come here for a moment!"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"Huh? Oh, coming Kojima-san!" said a startled Conan as he was jostled out of a Yaiba discussion between Souta and Genta.

'Anything to get out of talking about Yaiba. I mean really, those two obsess way too much about that for it to be healthy.'

"Yes Kojima-san? Did you need anything?" he asked, wonder what he could be needed for.

"Oh nothing much, my brother just wants to get a closer look at you, being a famous detective and all and living with Sleeping Kogoro too. Isn't that right Daiki?"

Looking at Conan, Daiki could indeed see that the Conan he was looking at was much bigger than the one in the picture.

"Uh? Oh, right, right. Well, I'm done, it was nice to meet you Conan-kun. Well you run off now, and don't get any bigger then you have already."

As Conan left, Jiro turned to his brother.

"See what I mean?"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Meanwhile, Conan was following Genta and Souta as they went upstairs with their twin cousins, Tokujiro and Tokujaro, both the same age as Genta was. He was pondering what Daiki had said as he left.

'What did he mean don't get any bigger? I haven't gained that much weight, have I? And none of it should be noticeable.'

As he continued walking, he passed by a mirror hanging on the wall, took one look at it and asked:

"Hey, Tokujiro-kun, where's your bathroom, I need to use it really badly."

"Oh, um...there's one down that hallway on the second door to the left."

"Thanks!" Conan shouted, running as fast as he could down the hallway. Which, if he had taken the time to notice, was considerably slower than normal.

'That can't be right! I couldn't have gained that much to look like that! I've got to see this myself.'

Reaching the bathroom door, he went inside and closed it quickly and locked it. Then, he proceeded to strip down to his underwear and stood on a stool as to better see the bathroom mirror.

'What...what happened to me...'

Reflecting back at him was not a svelte grade-schooler, but a round, startled boy with a round, tan potbelly with a navel so deep, he could fit an entire finger all the way in. His chest poofy and round were soon becoming boy breasts. Looking down, he found that his belly obscured his view enough that only his toes were visible. And, later in a very private moment, found that his crotch was smaller than before. His arms and legs were plump and round with chubby hands and feet that had fat fingers and toes. His face had become much more fuller, with plump cheeks and a modest second chin. His butt had grown twice as large as before and stretched his briefs to the max. And his backside had started to sag down a bit with all the fat and merged into his new love handles and other fat rolls throughout his body.

'I've got to see how much I weigh...' he said in shock.

Finding a scale, he look down as the number 80 came up.

'Fifteen pounds! At this rate, I'll weigh as much as Genta! I've gotta start doing something quick!'

Unfortunately, for his waistline, Genta was knocking on the door with one of the greatest desserts known to man.

"Conan-kun, hurry up! You've been there for twenty minutes! Uncle Genji's already here and he's brought his three-fudge-chocolate cake!" yelled Genta.

Putting on his clothes, he stepped out...only to have a mouthful of cake shoved in his mouth.

"So Conan-kun, how does it taste?" said Genta with a sly look.

"It's delicious!" said Conan, who grabbed the rest of the cake and started scarfing it down, the cake being the only thing on his mind.

"Well, then come downstairs! There's a lot more food that's just as great!"

And so, they went and gorged themselves. They laughed and talked and Conan met some of Genta's relatives, all who were on the heavy side themselves, and felt a bit embarrassed as the females cooed over at how cute he was and gave him more food. And the entire time, he ate those offerings and more too. He had seconds and thirds and fourths, he just couldn't believe how great it was! And as he ate, he felt his worries slip away. He could do something next week, when the reunion was over.

Later, it was a very full and tired Conan who went up to the guest room he shared with Genta. This was also a Conan that decided to drink a bit more of Genta's stomachache cure, due to his gorging causing a huge stomachache.

Falling asleep, Conan never noticed that his body's metabolism had slowed again, to the point where it was only a quarter of what it was. No more bean pole Conan for him and gone were the days where he could eat like a pig and not gain an ounce. There was only more and more fat for him.

Such were the facts that those of the Kojima family had to know, who had always been made to be heavier than others, and Conan himself was considered part of Kojima family now.

And so, in a peaceful slumber, it was Conan Kojima that dreamed of dancing fudge cakes and steaming chicken. Not Conan Edogawa nor Shinchi Kudo. It was Conan Kojima who was drooling at the dream of buffet, full of food of all kinds, and it was Conan Kojima who woke up the next morning, eating a stack of pancakes piled high with eggs, bacon, french toast, and a bowl of cereal. It was Conan Kojima who was sitting with the other young Kojimas, talking about the days activities while being hugged by aunts and grandmothers and partaking in a eating contest. Which, he had done very well at considering he was smaller compared to Genta and other kids his age who had come to the reunion, all of them themselves round like butterballs.

Scratch that, Conan was definitely part of the Kojima family now!

A couple of months ago, school had ended and Conan, while liking his new friends but not wanting to spend three months doing mind-numbing seven year old things, opted for camp, and was set on spending two months in a cabin somewhere in the outskirts of Kyoto talking about the awesomeness of Sherlock Holmes and showing off by solving fake crime scenes.

So, while Conan was asleep on the bus with his head against the window, the bus' hefty driver continued on, not at all knowing about the mix-up.

All the while Conan was feeling a little upset about his new camp and also was feeling a little left out being around a bunch of sumo enthusiasts while he himself knew almost nil about sumo other than then the basics.

"...and now for your schedules. Each of your days will go like this," said an older wrestler. "You will wake up at 7 o'clock in the morning to practice your skills with each other 'till noon, where we have lunch until 2 o'clock, followed by a forty-five minute nap. He sighed a little as he realized once again that he'd probably be in stuck in his room all day, rereading his detective books as the other children made friends. "I'll try being a sumo wrestler Wakaki-san!" he yelled. 'After all,' he thought, 'I'd rather be around people my own age, even if my age is now seven again. Plus, I'd wouldn't really be a sumo. Wakamashi Kai. Business owner

154.content:
Conan sighted as he looked around the classroom, his bespectacled eyes being drawn to the front where a seven year old girl was sitting, working on the math problem that was written on the blackboard. Her name was Ikumi Koga, the daughter of a rich and powerful businessman, Yuuto Koga, the CEO of the largest computer and technology manufacturing company in Japan. He wasn't looking at her due to personal interest, but about something he had discovered last weekend, at the end of another case

"And that is how you committed the murder Mr. Richards" Conan spoke into his voice changer, his voice coming out as that of his honorary uncle, Kogoro Moure "And Detective Takagi has already been given the evidece, so don't bother trying to argue your way out."

"Damn it no!" the blonde british man screamed as two officers placed handcuffs on him "You son of a bitch! You won't get away with this!"

"I recommend you keep quiet" the inspector said, walking over to the slumped over form of Kogoro, Conan quickly dashing out from his hiding spot behind him "Great job as usual Moure!" the inspector exclaimed, giving the sleeping man a smack on the back, jolting him awake

"Uh?" the man slurred, still half asleep

"Yeah, you did great Oji-San!" Conan chirped in a childish tone "That guy never saw it coming!"

"Uh, yeah of course I did! I am the great Kogoro Moure after all!" the man said, a huge smile on his face as he boasted

"Oh brother..." Conan whispered under his breath, zoning out the private eye's ramblings "I just keep making his head bigger... Wait, what's that?" he wondered as something on the floor caught his eye, a small piece of paper with something typed on it. The boy picked it up and skimmed it quickly
Asahi, while the offer for work is appriciated and the amount is indeed tempting, I'm going to pass up on this one. Normaly, I would have no problem helping along with a kidnapping, especialy one this easy, but I've heard horror stories about Koga and his security. YOur goign to have to find someone else to help you bag the girl. Signed Norman Richards

"This must have fallen out of his pocket..." Conan thought, glancing over to the squad car, where the officers where shoving the still screaming Richard into the backseat "He got offered a job to kidnap some one. Koga... why does that name sound familiar...." his eyes snapped open as he remembered where he heard the name "Ikumi! They want to kidnap her!" quickly turning around, he called the inspector over and gave him the note.

Unfortunate, that's where his luck in this case ended. The inspector said that it was worth looking into and told him he would get back to Moure if he found something. For the next three days, Conan stayed up till the middle of the night, listening in on Moure's phone conversations and hadn't heard anything from the inspector. After that, he tried explaining it to Kogoro, only for the man to pick him up by the back of his shirt and toss him onto the couch, screaming at him to stay out of police business. With that as a dead end, he tried to go to Agasa and Ai, only to find them out of town for a conference out of town, with Ai leaving strick instructions not to enter her lab.

That left him pretty much alone, since he felt that he couldn't share this with the other Detective Boys. So right now, he needed a way to get close to his classmate

"Oh, Ikumi-chan!" he heard the voice his friend Ayumi, looking up, he saw the cheerful girl walking into the classroom, waving to the chubby girl "Happy Birthday!"

"Thank you Ayumi-chan" Ikumi said with a smile. Conan couldn't help but grin. If she was having a party, he had his way in.
